column4: Hi, I upgradded hoary->breezy->dapper, do I need to re-do setting up the architecture-specific kernel?
not if you didn't change the hardware under the kernel you don't
you've looked at the discs, and they are clean?  could try a dvd cleaner (not a disc cleaner) - a dvd cleaner is a disc you put in your drive to clean it
The disks are brand new, so yeah.  I could see a dvd cleaner helping.  I haven't really used my CD/DVD reader/writer hardly at all, but the laptop is 1.5 years old.
